title: SCS ENGLISH 206-CN-62 Reading and Writing Poetry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Intended for students with little or no formal training in the elements of writing poetry, this course combines both seminar and workshop methods and includes extensive reading of poetry. Students use analytical skills presented in the course to critique each others' drafts of poems written during the quarter.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: May not be audited or taken P/N. Advanced composition course or equivalent writing experience strongly recommended.

subject: ENGLISH
